STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with real-time insights into new Ethereum activity
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: See what developers and companies have to say about our Ethereum transaction monitoring app.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Tracr has been invaluable for monitoring new Ethereum transactions in real-time. The alerts and data integrations have supercharged our dApp development process.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: With Tracr, we finally have a reliable way to track new transactions across the Ethereum network. Their API and data indexing tools are top-notch.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Tracr's Ethereum monitoring capabilities have been a game-changer for our research team. The insights we've gained have allowed us to stay ahead of the curve.
TESTIMONIAL_GIVER_3_DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOL: Head of Crypto Research, Investment Firm
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about finding new Ethereum transactions
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How can I discover new Ethereum transactions?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app connects directly to the Ethereum blockchain and streams new transactions in real-time. Simply launch the app and you'll see an up-to-date feed of all new transactions as they get mined.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: What information is provided for each transaction?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: For every new transaction, you'll see details like the sender and receiver addresses, the amount of ETH transferred, the gas price and limits, and any data included in the transaction.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I filter or search transactions?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, you can apply filters to only show transactions matching certain criteria like minimum ETH amount, specific addresses, or transaction types (contracts, tokens, etc).
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How far back can I view transactions?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: The app stores transactions for the last 30 days. For any transactions before that time period, you'll need to use a blockchain explorer.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Not currently, but a mobile app for both iOS and Android is in our roadmap for later this year. The web app is fully responsive for mobile browsers in the meantime.

LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Discover the latest Ethereum transactions with our cutting-edge platform.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Stay ahead of the curve with our powerful tool that allows you to monitor and analyze new Ethereum transactions as they occur.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_1: Our app helps you stay up-to-date on the latest Ethereum transactions as they occur on the blockchain.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_2: With real-time monitoring and notification capabilities, you'll never miss a beat in the dynamic world of Ethereum.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_3: Whether you're a trader, developer, or simply an enthusiast, our app provides valuable insights into the Ethereum network.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_4: Stay informed, make informed decisions, and unlock the full potential of the Ethereum ecosystem.
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_CREATE_ACCOUNT_PLACEHO: Get Started with Ethereum Transaction Tracking
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Stay up-to-date with the latest Ethereum transactions. EtherScan provides real-time tracking of new transactions on the Ethereum blockchain.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge transaction monitoring system. Get instant notifications for new Ethereum transactions as they occur, giving you a competitive edge in the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Fine-tune your transaction monitoring with our powerful filtering tools. Customize your search criteria based on parameters like wallet addresses, token types, and transaction values, ensuring you only receive alerts for the transactions that matter most.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Effortlessly incorporate our transaction monitoring service into your existing workflows and applications. Our robust API and developer-friendly documentation make it easy to integrate our powerful features into your software stack.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Access a detailed record of all monitored transactions, complete with timestamps, values, and associated metadata. Our platform serves as a centralized hub for all your Ethereum transaction data, simplifying analysis and decision-making processes.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Tailor our alerting system to your specific needs. Set up custom notifications based on transaction criteria, delivery channels, and urgency levels, ensuring you never miss a critical transaction event.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Rest assured that your transaction data is protected by industry-leading security protocols. Our platform employs state-of-the-art encryption, access controls, and monitoring systems to safeguard your sensitive information.
CTA_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge Ethereum transaction monitoring tool. Uncover the latest transactions as they happen, giving you an unparalleled advantage in the dynamic world of blockchain.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Our app scans the Ethereum blockchain to notify you of the latest transactions as they happen.

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Ethereum Transaction Finder
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app helps you discover and track new transactions on the Ethereum blockchain in real-time. It scans the network and notifies you instantly when new transactions are added.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We have nodes connected directly to the Ethereum network that stream new block and transaction data to our servers. Our app processes this data stream and surfaces new transactions to you as they occur.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What can I use it for?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: This app is useful for anyone interested in monitoring the Ethereum network, such as traders looking for new transaction activity, developers tracking their smart contracts, or researchers analyzing blockchain data.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How often is the data updated?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Our transaction feed is updated in real-time, with new transactions streamed directly from the Ethereum nodes as soon as they are added to the blockchain.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our app monitors the Ethereum blockchain in real-time, alerting you to new transactions as soon as they are confirmed.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Set filters to only track transactions of interest, such as those involving specific wallet addresses or smart contracts.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Choose to receive notifications via email, mobile push, or integrated with your existing monitoring tools.
